text: int main ( ) { int t , n , currentele , prevele , count , i ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { long long answer = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & currentele ) ; if ( i == 0 ) count = 1 ; else { if ( currentele >= prevele ) ++ count ; else count = 1 ; } answer += count ; prevele = currentele ; } printf ( "%d\n" , answer ) ; } return 0 ; }
